Member Function Documentation

int64_t gaia::core::MemoryInfo::getAvailMem ( )

The total available memory on the system.

This number should not be considered absolute: due to the nature of the kernel, a significant portion of this memory is actually in use and needed for the overall system to run well.

bool gaia::core::MemoryInfo::getLowMemory ( )

Set to true if the system considers itself to currently be in a low memory situation.

Warning:
Should always check isDataReady before use this function.
MemoryInfoProxy* gaia::core::MemoryInfo::getProxy ( ) const [inline, private]
